ygData.subject: Re: Location of pages for research
ygData.msgSnippet: According to EQ the pages ore completely random so people will not camp places for them. To quote : Research instruction books will list the components needed
ygData.messageBody:
According to EQ the pages ore completely random so people will not camp
places for them. To quote :

"Research instruction books will list the components needed to produce a
scroll. Spell components can be
found scattered throughout the world - they appear randomly on different
creatures, so you will not have to
'camp' a spot to get a certain component. Components can be stored and
traded - ask around - 13 of the
14 classes out there will not be able to use the research component that you
need.

Research components are usually found on intelligent creatures, or on
creatures that are innately magical."

I have yet to find the Enchanter's research instruction book. :(

Lalan

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 10:38 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Location of pages for research

From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

I posted a message yesterday, but have yet to see a response.
Does anyone know what creatures we need to be fighting to
find the pages for our research? Someone posted which pages
combine to make what spell, but didn't mention how to get them.

I am sure we are all eagerly awaiting this info...
